text: usakee saza mein azaab (ke maje) chakho beshak jin logon ne qayaamat ke din khuda kee huzooree ko jhuthalaaya vah bade ghaate mein hain yahaan tak ki jab unake sar par qayaamat naagaha (ek dam aa) pahanchegee to kahane lagegen ai hai aphasos ham ne to isamen badee kotaahee kee (ye kahate jaege) aur apane gunaahon ka pushtaara apanee apanee peeth par laadate jaenge dekho to (ye) kya bura bojh hai jisako ye laade (laade phir rahe) hain
